mapper.select: SELECT [monit_mc_name] , [start_time] , [end_time] , [shot_count] FROM [thingworx2080].[dbo].[z_fanuc_one_hour_shotcount] where start_time >= #{startTime} and shot_count is not null and monit_mc_name like '3F%' order by id

SELECT [start_time] , [end_time] , sum(shot_count) as shot_count FROM [thingworx2080].[dbo].[z_fanuc_one_hour_shotcount] where start_time >= #{startTime} and shot_count is not null group by start_time, end_time
